runs.comm: a loosener to begin with, outside off stump, Nazir lets it go through to Akmal
this one is much closer to off stump and bounces from a  good length, Nazir tries to drive off the back foot and gets beaten
Nazir tries to pull one that isn't short at all, the ball hurries on to him, beats him for pace and hits him in an area that's very painful, down he goes
full ball on off stump, Hafeez gets off the mark with a punchy off-drive to long off
Afridi frees his arms and slices a full and wide delivery over point, he's not timed that well and the ball stops in the outfield as soon as it pitches
that was hammered! Afridi moves forward to a full ball and drove it so hard back at the bowler that Mortaza simply dived out of the way and the ball raced to the boundary
good length ball on middle and off stump, driven off the back foot to mid-off
the length isn't short but Hafeez gets into position quickly to pull the ball into the gap between midwicket and mid-on
Hafeez opens the face to run the ball to short third man where Junaid dives full length to his right to bring off a one-handed save, Hafeez thought there was a single but had to hurry back
too short from Rasel and Hafeez dispatches it to the square leg boundary with a superbly timed short-arm pull
fuller length on leg and middle stump, pushed off the pads towards midwicket
full length once again on middle stump, driven firmly off the front foot to cover
pitches outside the off stump and angles into Afridi who moves across and gets hit high on the pad, they run a leg bye towards the on-side
Mortaza strays on to leg stump and Hafeez flicks past the fielder at short fine leg for four more
Mortaza slips down leg once again but this time Hafeez can't make contact with the flick, that's a wide
better line and length, Mortaza pitches on off and angles the ball into middle, Hafeez defends off the front foot
pushed towards midwicket with a closed face for a single
that's a golf swing! Afridi moved towards the off side and swung a full delivery from off stump over the deep midwicket fence, that was hit with immense power, the spectators better watch out
and again, this time Afridi mis-times the pull and even though it's more of a bottom edge than anything else, the ball still has enough power on it to run to the boundary
Hafeez matches Afridi's power with a deft late cut that races past short fine leg for a boundary, same result with lesser effort!
defended towards midwicket off the front foot
full ball on the pads, Hafeez flicks to the fielder at short fine leg, the next ball is a free hit because Rasel had over-stepped
caught but it doesn't count, Hafeez backed away to a full toss and lofted it high in the air to Aftab at mid-off, he took a well judged catch but the batsman can't be out caught off a free hit
Afridi walks towards the off side and flicks the ball powerfully over midwicket for four more
he backs away towards leg this time and flat bats it towards cover
good length delivery angling across the right-hander, Hafeez defends the ball towards cover off the front foot
Afridi moves across his stumps and tries to pull through square leg, he doesn't make contact
bowled full and fast outside off, driven off the front foot towards cover
Hafeez backs away to make room and plays a lovely inside-out cover drive, Rasel tries to dive and save the boundary but lets the ball go over the ropes
swept in the air past short fine leg for two more
defended on the front foot towards the off side
Hafeez waits on the back foot and late-cuts the ball to short third man
Afridi moves towards the off once again and swats the ball over square leg, the ball slows up after pitching but still has enough legs to reach the boundary
this time he backs away towards leg and throws his bat at a full delivery on off stump, he slices it over backward point but the fielder gives chase and hauls it in just inside the boundary
another boundary, this time he goes back towards the off side and plays a short-arm pull through square leg, there's no-stopping that
driven off the front foot to long-off
caught at long off! Hafeez gets under a full delivery and lofts towards long-off, he hasn't hit it with enough power to clear the boundary and Tamim Iqbal takes a simple catch near the boundary line
and he has! Afridi stays in his crease, frees his arms and smashes a full ball over long-on for six, that's a huge hit
defended off the front foot towards cover
bowled flat on off stump, Butt leans forward and defends to cover
defended back to the bowler on the back foot
driven through midwicket for a single
full delivery on off stump, driven off the front foot towards cover
caught! Afridi moves on to the back foot and tries to play a delicate late cut, Razzak bowls one flat and quick and forces a thick outside edge that is taken sharply by Mushfiqur
driven off the front foot to long-on
tossed up on off stump, Younis reaches forward and blocks
defended to point off the back foot
Younis gets pushed on to the back foot by a quicker one, Younis gets an outside edge to short third man where a mis-field allows the single
defended on the front foot to the off side
forced off the back foot towards midwicket
played towards third man off the back foot

stumped off a wide, excellent reflexes from Mushfiqur, Razzak fired one down leg side, Younis Khan tried to turn it behind square but missed, he over-balanced and lifted his back leg and in the split second that he needed to get back into his crease, Mushfiqur had whipped off the bails
tossed up outside the off stump, Malik gets forward and defends back to the bowler
driven of the front foot to deep point
defended towards midwicket off the back foot
Butt moves back in his crease and plays a wristy drive to long-on
flicked off the pads behind square for a single
driven back to the bowler on the front foot
bowled full and fast, angling the ball into the batsman, not giving Malik any room, defended back to the bowler
defended on the front foot to the off side
pushed gently into the massive gap in the midwicket-mid on region for an easy two
Malik leans forward and closes the face of the bat to play it to square leg
driven off the front foot to long-on
tossed up and on the stumps, defended to the off side for a single
flat and on the stumps, driven towards mid-on off the back foot, the bowler goes to his right and fields
slightly shorter and on the leg stump, worked away to the on side
eased away towards point for a single that rotates the strike
once again flat and on teh stumps, quick single pinched as the ball is dabbed away
down the leg side, left alone, and that's easily called a wide
full, flat and on the off, defended watchfully
full and on the stumps, defended watchfully
down the pitck, big heave and a miss, thick inside edge onto pad
eased through midwicket uppishly but safely
eased into the vacant spaces at midwicket
short of a length and outside the off stump, cut away through the off side
flat and on the pads, the batsman goes right back and pushes the ball through midwicket
flatter and on the pads, just slipping down leg, helped along down towards fine-leg
fuller and on the pads, Malik comes down the pitch and times this delectably through midwicket. That's a beautiful shot in this brutal form of the game
short of a length and on the stumps, a touch quicker, Malik goes down on one knee and pulls through square-leg
fuller and on the pads, Butt dabs the ball to the on side
down the leg side, quite full and flat again, swept away but not hit too well
flat, quick, on the stumps, swept down to short fine-leg
down the pitch and swung over the leg side quite agriculturally. Didn't get hold of that.
fuller and tossed up a touch more, nurdled through square
flat and straight, Malik goes across to off and sweeps really hard. That beats short fine-leg easily and races away to the fence
fullish and on the off, worked down to long-on for a single that brings up the 100 for Pakistan
short of a length and on the off, Butt plays to the on side but is entrely unconvincing
short of a length and on the pads, played down towards wide long-on
tossed up and on the off, well flighted, defended towards point for a single

down the pitch and slogged towards the on side. Malik has a bit of a brain-freeze and tries to hit this ball out of the ground. He doesn't get hold of it but the fielder on the ropes in front of square on the leg side, Aftab Ahmed, holds on to a really good catch just inches in front of the ropes
short of a length and on the stumps, driven through the leg side
flat and on the legs, clipped away towards square-leg for a single
slightly wide and outside the off, stroked away with an angled bat through point
short of a driving length and outside the off, Butt slashes at this one, off a thick outside edge down to third-man

very full, very straight, that's quite quick too. Misbah misses that one and it's homing in on the stumps. There's a loud shout from the bowler and up goes the finger. Could there be a bit of a wobble here? Pakistan not doing this at all comfortably
very full and straight, Mortaza trying to repeat the ball that got Misbah. It's just a touch too foll and straight, though, with fine-leg in the circle. Helped along past the fielder and that's four
down the pitch and carved over the off side. This is a suicidal shot from Imran Nazir. Mahmudullah runs in and dives forward but cannot hold onto the catch
fullish and outside the off, driven inside out through cover
short of a good length and outside the off, punched through cover off the front foot for a rare sensible and risk-free run
short of a length and on the pads, Nazir works the ball through leg
short of a length and outside the off, cut down through point but not terribly well
short of a driving length and outside the off, played down towards point with an angled bat

full and down the leg side, helped along over the infield. There's a simple run. Salman Butt is sauntering about outside the crease, not trying properly to make his ground. Mushfiqur Rahim is alert - something Butt certainly wasn't - and throws the stumps down. This is incredibly sloppy cricket from someone who is attempting a comeback and has just been appointed vice-captain of the team.
slightly short of a length and down the leg side, Nazir climbs into this one, launching it into the stands over square-leg. Shot!
full and on the stumps, defended back down the stumps with bat held close to pad
full and on the stumps, driven inside out through cover
flat, quicker, on the stumps, defended away to the off side for a quick single
tossed up and on the stumps, defended back down the pitch to the bowler
full and on the stumps, bit of loop there, dug out towards cover
short of a length and wide outside the off, big slashing cut played and missed
flat and on the off, dabbed to the off side for a quick single. Ashraful fields but does not pick up the ball cleanly. If he had done so ...
quick, on the off, quite full, Nazir opens the face of the bat and runs the ball just wide of the wicketkeeper. No-one's going to stop that one and Pakistan get close to the target
full and on the stumps, Nazir drops the ball to the on side with soft hands and scampers a single
short of a good length  and on the pads, clipped away off the hips for a single

short one banged in. There are two fielders in the deep for the ball. Mortaza can't get much bounce from this pitch at his pace, though. The ball sits up a bit and Nazir pulls well in fron of square for another boundary
driven inside out and powerfully but straight to the man at cover
short of a good length, outside the off, chopped away in front of point and that's an easy couple to seal the game
